event.name: New Adventurer Bundle
event.desc: Welcome to the world of Spellstone! I've procured a one-time bundle to help start your journey!

event.desc: Gives one copy of a ^cE7FFEl Bronceadon^cFFFF! May be purchased unlimited times.

event.name: Guild Clash Practice Rerun
event.desc: Practice for the Guild Clash to earn stars and rewards! Same battleground conditions as Guild Clash including current active global effects. All attacks are available for the start!

event_reward.desc: Complete the Challenge at Rank 500 or higher.

event.name: Double Bounties Gold!
event.desc: Time for one final push on the last day of the Brawl! Earn double gold rewards from Bounties!

event.name: Attention! Flask Expiration
event.desc: Some old Red Champion Stone Flasks rewarded from past Challenges now have an expiration date. Check your inventory and use them before they disappear.

event.name: Card Buffs!
event.desc: A number of cards have had their stats increased! You can use the Resummon feature to get them back at a discounted price for a limited time! Join the Official Discord for more information!

event.name: Elemental Arena Chest
event.desc: Use Arena Coins to pull from a set of Dual ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFreward cards or the chance of an Arena Trophy! Each pull also grants Sneggle Stones!

event.name: Angel Arena Chest
event.desc: Use Arena Coins to pull from a set of Dual ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFReward cards or the chance of an Arena Trophy! Each pull also grants ^cE7FFRasako Stones^cFFFF!
